SectionBody.Text: The following provision shall apply to creditable service as defined in s. 121.021(17): no creditable service which remained unclaimed at retirement may be claimed or purchased after a retirement benefit payment has been cashed or deposited.

Note.Text: The word “provision” was substituted for the word “provisions” by the editors to conform to context; s. 36, ch. 2012-116, repealed subsection (1), leaving only one provision in the section.
